title: Supply of Office Equipment
description: Tender for the supply of office equipment including computers, printers, and furniture.

elegibility: Minimum 5 years of experience in supplying office equipment.
Must have supplied to at least 3 large corporations in the last 2 years.
technical_checklist: Delivery Time: Must be within 6 weeks from the date of order.
Installation: On-site installation and setup required.
Others: Include 2 years of free maintenance and support.
financial_checklist: All costs must be itemized clearly.
Quotes must be valid for at least 90 days.
Payment terms: 30% advance, 70% upon delivery and installation.
legal: Must comply with all local and national regulations regarding office equipment supply.
Must be atleast 80% made in India Products.
